title: prog.go:8: internal compiler error: syslook: can't find runtime.convE2E
body:
1. What is a short input program that triggers the error?

package main

type T interface{}
type V interface{}

func main() {
	var t T
	var v V = t
	_ = v
}


2. What is the full compiler output?

prog.go:8: internal compiler error: syslook: can't find runtime.convE2E
[plus a message telling me to report this bug here]


3. What version of the compiler are you using?  (Run it with the -V flag.)

It's whatever golang.org is running right now.
runtime.Version() says "release.r56 7666+"
